about_the_game:
GlaiveBound is an exciting co-op adventure featuring four young heroes looking to make their mark on Élodia.

In this multi-act saga, you and your friends will work together to solve puzzles, overpower the forces of Klaydem, and discover ancient swords to command the elements of nature.

Uncover the truth behind the mysteries of the past!

Exploration through 4 Player Online Coop:
- Bring up to three of your friends on an adventure to explore the rich world of Élodia from the Anafel Woods to the imperial capital and its labyrinthian underworld.

Player Coordination with Real Time Combat
-Coordinate with your friends and wield the elemental powers of nature to overcome the forces of Klaydem.

Character Driven Story Telling
- Follow Lant as he pursues the Black Knight and unravel a long lost conspiracy that could upend the entire world of Élodia.
- Experience the personalities and discover the backstories of four unique, playable characters.

Additional Features
- Fully animated 2D sprites for over 15 characters
- 5 distinct 3D tilesets
- Over 20 unique swords inspired by real world history
- 10+ Hours of Gameplay with your closest friends and loved ones!
